values less than -1.5 indicting to dry month and higher than 1.5 indicating to wet month (Li et al., 2015). However, we reclassified SPEI data to four categories to reflect the conditions of entire growing season: 1 (SPEI between -1.5 to 1.5) for normal season, 2 (SPEI < -1) for dry season, 3 (SPEI > 2) for wet and 4 (SPEI <-1 and > 2) for seasons have both dry and wet condition.
AEZ for the period 1981-2010 was downloaded from Food and Agriculture Organisation (FAO) Global Agro-Ecological Zones (GAEZ) data portal (FAO and IIASA, 2021).
downloaded from Soil Grid (Hengl et al., 2017) at 900 m spatial resolution.

The weight average of the 3 depth is taken to represent the 0-30 cm depth.
